title: Why inventories rise at start of recession

content.question: As an indicator of an impending recession, inventories will most likely

choices.label: decrease as a result of a decrease in consumption
increase as a result of a decrease in consumption
increase as a result of a decrease in aggregate supply
decrease as a result of an increase in aggregate supply
remain constant as a result of economic uncertainty

content.answer: increase as a result of a decrease in consumption

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle
